702639f-a.text:
20th Avenue (right), adjoining the N. W. corner of Cropsey Avenue, showing the Buena Vista Hotel. The view is up 20th Avenue across fill for the new Belt Parkway.
May 28, 1939
P. L. Sperr

702638f-b.text:
(1)
Twentieth Ave., west side, south of Cropsey Ave., showing the
"Captain's Pier.'
1922.
Eugene L. Armbruster Collection.
(2)
The same, showing a westerly view. (Warehouse Ave. will cut directly through the end of the pavilion on the pier when completed).
March 1925.
Eugene L. Armbruster Collection.
(3)
The same, another view.
1922.
Eugene L. Armbruster Collection. 1
